title.rendered: “IDF and Emergency Services Unite to Combat Northern Wildfires: Situation Assessment & Updates”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces, together with firefighting and rescue forces; a joint operation to gain control over the fire sites in the northern part of the country.

Attached is a video of the Northern Command Commander assessing the situation at the firefighting station in Kiryat Shmona: https://bit.ly/3VbljQU

Attached are images of the Northern Command Commander assessing the situation at the firefighting station in Kiryat Shmona: https://idfanc.activetrail.biz/ANC04062-2476585

Attached is a recording of the firefighting battalion commander (7763) of the Home Front Command, Lieutenant Colonel (res.) Shlomi Verdi: https://bit.ly/4c5dZgl
